# AnalyticsZone

> Privacy-First Sports Analytics Applications

AnalyticsZone is a suite of professional sports analytics applications for running, swimming, cycling, and walking. We provide privacy-first, scientifically-backed tools for athletes and coaches to track performance, analyze training data, and optimize athletic progression.

## Sites

- [Main Site](https://analyticszone.app)
- [Run Analytics](https://run.analyticszone.app)
- [Bike Analytics](https://bike.analyticszone.app)
- [Swim Analytics](https://swim.analyticszone.app)
- [Walk Analytics](https://walk.analyticszone.app)
- [Cardio Analytics](https://cardio.analyticszone.app)

## Core Features

- **Privacy First**: All data processing happens locally on your device. No cloud uploads.
- **Scientific Metrics**: Based on peer-reviewed sports science (Critical Power, TSS, TRIMP).
- **Multi-Platform**: Available on iOS and WatchOS.

## Documentation

- [Privacy Policy](https://analyticszone.app/en/privacy/)
- [Terms of Service](https://analyticszone.app/en/terms/)
